content:
Dear NVSS Modernization COP Members :

Happy New Year!

Thank you for your interest in participating in the NCHS organized testing event January 24-25th, 2022 either as a tester or an observer. This event will focus on testing the NVSS FHIR
API, NVSS API Client Reference Implementation and bidirectional flow using STEVE 2.0.

As mentioned, we will be using the NVSS COP Office Hours on January 4, 11, 18, 2022 to prepare for this event (4 to 5pm ET). You should have received an invite for the 2022
Office Hours weekly meetings. If not, please send a note to NVSSmodernizaton@cdc.gov and we will make sure and send it to you. We request that you have technical staff from your VRO
and/or vendor organization responsible for this testing activity attend the weekly prep calls. Attached is the meeting agenda.

We will use the Zulip FHIR Chat > Death on FHIR stream ((32595) Death on FHIR - FHIR Community - Zulip) as our technical help desk portal leading up to and during the testing
event. If you have any technical questions please pose them on Zulip FHIR chat. Someone from our technical team will get back to you within 24-48 hours.

In addition, you may consider reviewing the following background resources on NVSS API as you prepare for this testing activity.

Suggested readings/resources

  • Background materials about the NVSS FHIR API on GitHubREADME.md

  • Overview of NVSS API presented during the December 2021 COP meeting (by Pete Krautscheid, MITRE)- Meeting recording and powerpoints

  • January 24-25,2022 event test cases and test plans

Please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at NVSSmodernization@cdc.gov if you have any questions.

We look forward to our continued collaborations,

Thanks,

Prachi

On behalf of

NVSS Modernization Community of Practice
Division of Vital Statistics/NCHS

A shared space for learning and innovation
Contact us at: NVSSmodernization@cdc.gov/
Technical Questions?: Zulip FHIR Chat: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179301-Death-on.20FHIR
For more information: https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/nvss/modernization/cop.htm
Check out our new video, now on NCHS’ YouTube channel: NVSS Modernization COP Video
